name: Alice in the Cities
summary_text: A German journalist is saddled with a nine-year-old girl after encountering her mother at a New York airport.

name: Thalapathi
summary_text: An orphan named Surya raised in a slum befriends a good crime boss named Devaraj and works for him. Their existence is threatened when a new honest district collector arrives.

name: Extraction
summary_text: A former CIA operative is kidnapped by a group of terrorists. When his son learns there is no plan for his father to be saved, he launches his own rescue operation.

name: Like Someone in Love
summary_text: In Tokyo, a young sex worker develops an unexpected connection with a widower over a period of two days.

name: Elephant White
summary_text: An assassin is hired by a businessman to avenge the murder of his daughter by white slave traders in Thailand.

name: Noises Off...
summary_text: A travelling theater group find so much action going on behind-the-scenes, they almost ruin the performances.

name: Scum
summary_text: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the 70's.

name: City of Life and Death
summary_text: In 1937, Japan occupied Nanjing, the Chinese capital. There was a battle and subsequent atrocities against the inhabitants, especially those who took refuge in the International Security Zone.

name: Water Lilies
summary_text: After meeting at a local pool over their summer break, a love triangle forms between three adolescent girls, which proves difficult to sustain as they each desire the love of another.

name: Run Silent Run Deep
summary_text: A U.S. sub commander, obsessed with sinking a certain Japanese ship, butts heads with his first officer and crew.

name: Klown
summary_text: In order to prove his fatherhood potential to his pregnant girlfriend, Frank 'kidnaps' her 12-year-old nephew and tags along on his best friend Casper's debauched weekend canoe trip.

name: Black Box
summary_text: After losing his wife and his memory in a car accident, a single father undergoes an agonizing experimental treatment that causes him to question who he really is.

name: Sylvia
summary_text: Story of the relationship between poets Edward James "Ted" Hughes (Daniel Craig) and Sylvia Plath (Gwyneth Paltrow).

name: Savior
summary_text: A hardened mercenary in the Foreign Legion begins to find his own humanity when confronted with atrocities during the fighting in Bosnia.

name: Vaaranam Aayiram
summary_text: A father and son help each other through growing up, romance, tragedy, and adventure.

name: 7 Aum Arivu
summary_text: A genetic engineering student tries to revive the skills of a past legend and use them to save India from a deadly virus attack orchestrated by China.

name: The I Inside
summary_text: An amnesiac discovers himself leaping through time between 2000 and 2002 as his past returns to him.

name: Bizim Için Sampiyon
summary_text: A true love and success story from the 1990s Turkey, revolving around a jockey (Halis Karatas), a horse (Bold Pilot) and the daughter of the horse's owner who is at the same time the voluntary caretaker of the horse.

name: The Tribe
summary_text: A deaf boy joins a boarding school for similar children. Confronted by the violent and criminal antics of some of the other boys and girls, he struggles to conform and join the 'tribe'.

name: After Life
summary_text: After death, people have a week to choose only one memory to keep for eternity.

name: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
summary_text: Despite knowing that their respective families are bitter enemies, Raj and Rashmi fall in love with each other and decide to elope.

name: Bella
summary_text: A chef with a mysterious past spends the day with a waitress who needs a friend.

name: The Wings of the Dove
summary_text: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

name: Ankhon Dekhi
summary_text: After a distressing incident, a Delhi man vows to believe only what he can see, but his new ideals soon take his life in extreme directions.

name: Ronja Robbersdaughter
summary_text: Borka and his band and Mattis's band of robbers are rivals. Birk, his parents and their band live in the wild in Mattisforrest. They move in to Metis-stronghold, which belonged to his ...                See full summary »

name: To End All Wars
summary_text: A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. Ultimately ...                See full summary »

name: Dirty Girl
summary_text: It's 1987 and Danielle, the high school 'Dirty Girl', is running away. With her is chubby, gay Clarke, a bag of flour called Joan and a Walkman full of glorious '80s tunes.

name: The Broken
summary_text: After seeing herself drive down the street, Radiologist Gina McVey unravels a mystery centered around a broken mirror.

name: Lost Souls
summary_text: A Catholic teacher meets an atheist journalist, whom a group of Catholics and Priests believes has been chosen by the devil to be the Antichrist.

name: New York
summary_text: A contemporary story of 3 friends discovering a new world set against the larger than life New York City. But one day the world around them changed.

name: Ill Manors
summary_text: The lives of four drug dealers, one user, and two prostitutes are explored.

name: I Sell the Dead
summary_text: A grave robber reflects on his life of crime.

name: Boss
summary_text: After his younger son falls prey to a corrupt police officer, an honest old man summons his estranged elder son to save the day.

name: Luce
summary_text: A married couple is forced to reckon with their idealized image of their son, adopted from war-torn Eritrea, after an alarming discovery by a devoted high school teacher threatens his status as an all-star student.

name: Ishtar
summary_text: Two terrible lounge singers get booked to play a gig in a Moroccan hotel but somehow become pawns in an international power play between the C.I.A., the Emir of Ishtar, and the rebels trying to overthrow his regime.

name: Open Season 3
summary_text: Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.

name: Scenic Route
summary_text: Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.

4 girls out on a 3 days trip in to 2 cities, if they survive. While Jo is working in a supermarket, her 3 friends are all out on their adventures. A chance encounter with diamond thieves sends them on a collision course with fate itself.

name: Agir Roman
summary_text: A young car mechanic, while in the middle of an unlikely love affair, tries to protect the people in his poor neighborhood from a gangster who terrorizes the locals.

name: Diary of a Country Priest
summary_text: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

name: Noroi
summary_text: A documentary filmmaker explores seemingly unrelated paranormal incidents connected by the legend of an ancient demon called the "kagutaba."

name: Don't Listen
summary_text: Daniel and Sara have a 9-year-old son, Eric, and they've just moved to a new home not knowing the neighbours call it "the house of the voices". Eric is the first one to notice the odd noises behind each door.

name: Our Hospitality
summary_text: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

name: Gangster's Paradise: Jerusalema
summary_text: A young hoodlum's rise from a small-time criminal to a powerful crime entrepreneur during the turbulent years before and after the fall of apartheid.

name: House II: The Second Story
summary_text: The new owner of a sinister house gets involved with reanimated corpses and demons searching for an ancient Aztec skull with magic powers.

name: Renegade
summary_text: In 1870, after a brutal run-in with an outlaw in a brothel, Mike Blueberry becomes marshal in Arizona where he keeps the peace between Whites and Apaches but an influx of Indian gold treasure-hunters threatens to lead to violence.

name: La Cérémonie
summary_text: A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.

name: To Be or Not to Be
summary_text: At the onset of WW2, a Polish actor's family and the Polish Resistance help the troupe of a theatre escape Poland and the invading Nazis.

name: The Swimmer
summary_text: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

name: The Mustang
summary_text: The story of Roman Coleman, a violent convict, who is given the chance to participate in a rehabilitation therapy program involving the training of wild mustangs.

name: The Distinguished Citizen
summary_text: A recipient of the Nobel Prize for Literature, who has been living in Europe for decades, accepts an invitation to receive a prize. In Argentina he finds both similarities and irreconcilable differences with the people of his hometown.

name: Support Your Local Sheriff!
summary_text: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

name: Action Jackson
summary_text: Vengence drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power hungry auto magnate who's systematically eliminating his competition.

name: Action Point
summary_text: A daredevil designs and operates his own theme park with his friends.

name: Motel Hell
summary_text: A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.

name: Fever Pitch
summary_text: A sports fan's romantic courtship clashes with his obsession with his favorite football team.

name: Toy Story That Time Forgot
summary_text: It's a post-Christmas play-date and the toys have to go up against the fearsome and aggressive new dino toys.

name: Barfuss
summary_text: Nick, a hedonistic bachelor, falls for an escaped mental patient.

name: One-Eyed Jacks
summary_text: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

name: Flipper
summary_text: A teenage boy sent to spend the summer with his eccentric uncle on the Florida coast befriends a remarkable dolphin and takes on local bad guys who are polluting the water.

name: The Grey Zone
summary_text: A Nazi doctor, along with the Sonderkommando, Jews who are forced to work in the crematoria of Auschwitz against their fellow Jews, find themselves in a moral grey zone.

name: That's What I Am
summary_text: In 1965, 13 y.o. paperboy Andy is paired up with a geek on a project in the popular junior high teacher's class. Andy learns and grows from it.

name: First Kid
summary_text: A former boxer turned Secret Service agent is assigned to protect the President's son, who seems determined to make life difficult for his new protector.

name: Only the Lonely
summary_text: A Chicago cop must balance loyalty to his overbearing mother and a relationship with a shy funeral home worker.

name: Strange Magic
summary_text: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

name: Pelle the Conqueror
summary_text: When his wife dies, Lassefar (Max von Sydow) takes his 12-year-old son, Pelle (Pelle Hvenegaard), from their home in Sweden to Denmark in search of a better life. Signing on as laborers at ...                See full summary »

name: Death of a Salesman
summary_text: An aging traveling salesman recognizes the emptiness of his life and tries to fix it.

name: Rosewater
summary_text: Iranian-Canadian journalist Maziar Bahari is detained by Iranian forces who brutally interrogate him under suspicion that he is a spy.

name: Columbus Circle
summary_text: An heiress who's been shut inside her apartment building for nearly two decades is forced to confront her fears after one of her neighbors is killed and a detective arrives to begin the investigation.

name: Terror Train
summary_text: Three years after a prank went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train.

name: The Human Race
summary_text: In THE HUMAN RACE a group of 80 people are ripped out of their daily lives and all re-appear in an undisclosed location. These people are from all walks of life: young and old, athletic and...                See full summary »

name: Kolpaçino
summary_text: After a violent shootout, a group of men have to hide two corpses.

name: Fireworks Wednesday
summary_text: On the last Wednesday before the spring solstice ushers in the Persian New Year, people set off fireworks following an ancient Zoroastrian tradition. Rouhi, spending her first day at a new job, finds herself in the midst of a different kind of fireworks -- a domestic dispute between her new boss and his wife.

name: Jumping the Broom
summary_text: Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.

name: Trespass
summary_text: Two firemen in a burning building get a treasure map - stolen gold church items are hidden in a closed down factory in St. Louis. Once there, they're trapped in by a black gang considering it their territory.

name: The Naked Spur
summary_text: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.

name: The Turning
summary_text: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past. A modern take on Henry James' novella "The Turn of the Screw."

name: Father of the Year
summary_text: Before NYC, college valedictorian Ben visits his trailer park loser dad. Same evening Ben argues with Larry about whose dad can kick the other dad's ass. Loser dad hears of this and tries to beat up doormat dad and chaos follows.

name: The Lady
summary_text: The story of Aung San Suu Kyi as she becomes the core of Burma's democracy movement, and her relationship with her husband, writer Michael Aris.

name: The African Doctor
summary_text: The story of Seyolo Zantoko, who as a freshly graduated doctor of Congolese descent in France, struggled with his family to integrate in a small rural village, and ended up being considered as one of the most respected doctors in the area.

name: One False Move
summary_text: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

name: The Cat o' Nine Tails
summary_text: A newspaper reporter and a retired, blind journalist try to solve a series of killings connected to a pharmaceutical company's experimental, top-secret research projects and in so doing, both become targets of the killer.

name: The Paradine Case
summary_text: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

name: Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo
summary_text: 14 years have passed since the near third impact. Most of the world has changed except Shinji Ikari who awakens, unaged in a new and strange environment. Misato has formed a group that has ...                See full summary »

name: Neseli Günler
summary_text: A mid-aged couple with 6 kids who are running a pickle shop gets divorced with 3 kids each. The family members find each other years later with a funny story.

name: All the Real Girls
summary_text: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

name: Theeb
summary_text: In the Ottoman province of Hijaz during World War I, a young Bedouin boy experiences a greatly hastened coming-of-age as he embarks on a perilous desert journey to guide a British officer to his secret destination.

name: Coffy
summary_text: A sexy black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

name: The Bang Bang Club
summary_text: A drama based on the true-life experiences of four combat photographers capturing the final days of apartheid in South Africa.

name: Synchronicity
summary_text: A physicist who invents a time machine must travel back to the past to uncover the truth about his creation and the woman who is trying to steal it.

name: For Richer or Poorer
summary_text: An unhappily married Manhattan socialite couple flee from the I.R.S. and end up in Amish country where they pretend to be visiting relatives.

name: Mr. Baseball
summary_text: Jack Elliot, once a great baseball player, is forced to play in Japan where his brash, egotistical ways cause friction with his new teammates and friends.

name: Potiche
summary_text: A housewife and grandma takes over the family business 1977, after her husband is hurt during a strike.

name: The Band Wagon
summary_text: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

name: Sing si lip yan
summary_text: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

name: The Bronze
summary_text: A foul-mouthed former gymnastics bronze medalist with local celebrity status reluctantly trains a rising Olympics aspirant.

name: Merantau
summary_text: A young man from the countryside uses his skills in silat martial arts to survive the slave trade.

name: Rane
summary_text: This film follows two Belgrade youths on their rise to gangster legends in a decaying society.

name: The Wanderers
summary_text: The Wanderers is a teenage, Italian gang in Bronx, NYC, 1963. They have their confrontations with other gangs. Drugs and weapons are uncool. Adult life awaits them.

name: Sanam Teri Kasam
summary_text: After being disowned by her family, an awkward librarian relies on the help of her brooding neighbour.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

name: Forever Strong
summary_text: A rugby player is put up in a juvenile detention center. There he plays for the Highland Rugby team and ultimately plays against his father in the National Championships.

name: Two Hands
summary_text: A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.

name: Billa 2
summary_text: Small-time diamond smuggler David befriends Goa-based gangster Abbasi. But when David begins to build inroads with an international gangster, Abbasi is not happy. Soon the two turn into bitter rivals.

name: Deewaar
summary_text: Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

name: Operation: Endgame
summary_text: A battle ensues among groups of government spy teams in an underground facility after their boss is assassinated.

name: The Lair of the White Worm
summary_text: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in foreign land, the residents of a near-by town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.

name: Then Came You
summary_text: A hypochondriac working as an airport baggage handler is forced to confront his fears when a British teenager with a terminal illness enlists him to help her carry out her eccentric bucket list.

name: Black Orpheus
summary_text: A retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice myth, set during the time of the Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro.

name: Kung Fu Jungle
summary_text: A martial arts instructor from the police force gets imprisoned after killing a man by accident. But when a vicious killer starts targeting martial arts masters, the instructor offers to help the police in return for his freedom.

name: Next Day Air
summary_text: Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes ten people's lives forever.

name: Bordertown
summary_text: A journalist investigates a series of murders near American-owned factories on the border of Juarez and El Paso.

name: The Dark and the Wicked
summary_text: On a secluded farm in a nondescript rural town, a man is slowly dying. His family gathers to mourn, and soon a darkness grows, marked by waking nightmares and a growing sense that something evil is taking over the family.

name: Ghosts of Mississippi
summary_text: A Mississippi district attorney and the widow of Medgar Evers struggle to finally bring a white racist to justice for the 1963 murder of the civil rights leader.

name: Father of the Bride
summary_text: The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.

name: Dead & Buried
summary_text: A suspense horror film set in a small coastal town where, after a series of gory murders commited by mobs of townspeople against visiting tourists, the corpses begin to come back to life.

name: 400 Days
summary_text: With their 400-day mission simulation nearing completion, 4 astronauts begin to feel something's amiss.

name: Graveyard Shift
summary_text: In a very old textile mill with a serious rat infestation, deadly accidents start happening, but the corrupt foreman continues to put his workers in danger, until they discover a horrifying secret deep in the basement.

name: Housefull 4
summary_text: Three couples who get separated from each other due to an evil ploy, reincarnate after 600 years and meet each other as history repeats itself again and their respective partners get mixed up this time.

name: Redacted
summary_text: The devastating reconstruction of the rape and murder of a 15-year-old Iraqi girl by American soldiers in Samarra in 2006.

name: The Man with the Golden Arm
summary_text: A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction.

name: The Uninvited
summary_text: A composer and his sister discover that the reason they are able to purchase a beautiful gothic seacoast mansion very cheaply is the house's unsavory past.

name: The Snow Walker
summary_text: A pilot and his passenger struggle for survival after crashing in the Arctic tundra.

name: Tere Bin Laden
summary_text: A reporter casts a fake Bin Laden to act in his video message to America, so he can immigrate there.

name: Red Joan
summary_text: The story of Joan Stanley, who was exposed as the K.G.B.'s longest-serving British spy.

name: Dave Chappelle: Equanimity
summary_text: Dave talks about not actually growing up in the projects, the hate he received from the transgender community, and from fake news.

name: Madea's Witness Protection
summary_text: A Wall Street investment banker who has been set up as the linchpin of his company's mob-backed Ponzi scheme is relocated with his family to Aunt Madea's southern home.

name: Red
summary_text: A reclusive man sets out for justice and redemption when three troublesome teens kill his dog for no good reason.

name: Ginger Snaps Back: The Beginning
summary_text: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves.

name: The Tax Collector
summary_text: A "tax collector" working for a local crime lord finds his family's safety compromised when the rival of his boss shows up in L.A. and upends the business.

name: Sirens
summary_text: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

name: De helaasheid der dingen
summary_text: A thirty-something novelist and impending father looks back on his all-too-formative years in the hapless, alcohol-ridden milieu of his youth in 1980s rural Flanders, Belgium.

name: The Duel
summary_text: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.

name: Project X
summary_text: An Air Force pilot joins a top secret military experiment involving chimps, but begins to suspect there might be something more to the mysterious "Project X".

name: The Candidate
summary_text: Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no hope of winning, so he is willing to tweak the establishment.

name: Ernest Saves Christmas
summary_text: Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.

name: Juzni vetar
summary_text: A young member of an underground gang in Belgrade puts himself and his family in danger when he crosses a mafia leader who works for the chief of police.

name: Turkish Delight
summary_text: A young love faces with old problems.

name: Work It
summary_text: When Quinn Ackerman's admission to the college of her dreams depends on her performance at a dance competition, she forms a ragtag group of dancers to take on the best squad in school...now she just needs to learn how to dance.

name: Happily N'Ever After
summary_text: An alliance of evil-doers, led by Frieda, looks to take over Fairy Tale Land. But when Ella realizes her stepmother is out to ruin her storybook existence, she takes a dramatic turn and blossoms into the leader of the resistance effort.

name: Muhsin Bey
summary_text: An ingenuous countryman Ali Nazik migrates to Istanbul and meets producer Muhsin Kanadikirik to have his first album.

name: In Darkness
summary_text: A dramatization of one man's rescue of Jewish refugees in the German-occupied Polish city of Lvov.

name: Don't Worry, I'm Fine
summary_text: Lili returns from holidays and learns that her twin brother left the house after a violent argument with their father.

name: Jilla
summary_text: A looming gangster after witnessing a bone chilling event, stands up against his father's prejudice.

name: Monsters: Dark Continent
summary_text: Monsters' reign continues to spread throughout the Earth.

name: Downhill
summary_text: Barely escaping an avalanche during a family ski vacation in the Alps, a married couple is thrown into disarray as they are forced to reevaluate their lives and how they feel about each other.

name: The Nativity Story
summary_text: A drama that focuses on the period in Mary and Joseph's life where they journeyed to Bethlehem for the birth of Jesus.

name: Other People
summary_text: A struggling comedy writer, fresh off a breakup and in the midst of the worst year of his life, returns to Sacramento to care for his dying mother.

name: Johnny Stecchino
summary_text: A kindhearted but bumbling idiot who likes to steal bananas, is passed off for a snitch hiding from the mob.

name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
summary_text: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs and sleaze.

name: When a Stranger Calls
summary_text: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

name: Dark Victory
summary_text: A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, and must decide whether or not she'll meet her final days with dignity.

name: Mahanati
summary_text: Biography of Savitri, an actress from South India movie industry, who ruled the industry for two decades during 50s and 60s.

name: Legal Eagles
summary_text: A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

name: The Quake
summary_text: In 1904 an earthquake of magnitude 5.4 on the Richter scale shook Oslo, with an epicenter in the "Oslo Graben" which runs under the Norwegian capital. There are now signs that indicate that we can expect a major future earthquake in Oslo.

name: Seal Team Six: The Raid on Osama Bin Laden
summary_text: A group of Navy SEALs comes to learn the identity of their target: Osama bin Laden.

name: The Secret: Dare to Dream
summary_text: A feature film adaptation of the self-help book, 'The Secret', which focuses on the power of positive thinking.

name: We Are the Best!
summary_text: Three girls in 1980s Stockholm decide to form a punk band -- despite not having any instruments and being told by everyone that punk is dead.

name: Deep in the Heart of Texas: Dave Chappelle Live at Austin City Limits
summary_text: Dave Chappelle gives his stand about racially charged run-ins, celebrity scandals and fatherly dilemmas in his stand-up set at Austin's Moody Theater.

name: Danger Close
summary_text: In August 1966, in a Vietnamese rubber plantation called Long Tan, 108 young and inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers are fighting for their lives against 2500 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong soldiers.

name: Tales from the Crypt
summary_text: Five strangers get lost in a crypt and, after meeting the mysterious Crypt Keeper, receive visions of how they will die.

name: Salyut-7
summary_text: USSR, June 1985. Based on actual events. After contact with the Salyut 7 space station is lost, cosmonauts Vladimir Dzhanibekov and Viktor Savinykh dock with the empty, frozen craft, and bring her back to life.

name: Sarmasik
summary_text: When the crew of a bankrupt cargo ship gets stuck on board for months, isolation breeds pressures that sink the men into a sea of madness and terror.

name: The One and Only Ivan
summary_text: A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.

name: Christmas Inheritance
summary_text: To be the CEO, an heiress is challenged by her dad to deliver a Christmas letter in person to his ex-partner in their hometown - traveling by bus, incognito and with only $100. Will she learn something from the people there?

name: Manam
summary_text: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.

name: Words and Pictures
summary_text: An art instructor and an English teacher form a rivalry that ends up with a competition at their school in which students decide whether words or pictures are more important.

name: Louis C.K.: Chewed Up
summary_text: Louis C.K.'s second one-hour special filmed at the Berklee Performance Center in Boston, MA.

name: Final Score
summary_text: After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her and prevent mass destruction.

name: Quo vado?
summary_text: Checco is born on the privileged side of life in an Italian small town, with a guaranteed job as a public servant. When a new reformist government vows to cut down on bureaucracy, Checco is forced to accept worsening conditions.

name: The Club
summary_text: A crisis counselor is sent by the Catholic Church to a small Chilean beach town where disgraced Priests and nuns, suspected of crimes ranging from child abuse to baby-snatching from unwed mothers, live secluded, after an incident occurs.

name: Visions
summary_text: After moving to a vineyard to start a new life with her husband, a pregnant woman begins to experience terrifying visions.

name: Hearts Beat Loud
summary_text: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

name: Romance
summary_text: Frustrated by the lack of intimacy in her relationship, a young schoolteacher goes through a series of intimidating and often violent sexual partners.

name: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
summary_text: Set during the Partition of India in 1947, a Sikh truck driver falls in love with a Muslim girl belonging to an aristocratic family.

name: The Odessa File
summary_text: Following the suicide of an elderly Jewish man, a journalist in possession of the man's diary investigates the alleged sighting of a former S.S. Captain, who commanded a concentration camp during World War II.

name: The Long Riders
summary_text: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a sympathetic portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who begin their legendary bank raids because of revenge.

name: The Big Bull
summary_text: The story of the film is based on real events of financial market that took place between 1990 and 2000 involving Harshad Mehta and his financial crimes.

name: On Chesil Beach
summary_text: Based on Ian McEwan's novel. In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.

name: A Very Brady Sequel
summary_text: The Bradys are surprised when a man claiming to be Carol's long lost first husband shows up at their home. Before long, his strange actions cause them to question his motives.

name: The Place
summary_text: The fates of an apparently random group of strangers who each come into contact with a mysterious figure who they believe possesses the power to grant any wish, in return for which they must carry out a task he assigns them.

name: Martin
summary_text: A young man, who believes himself to be a vampire, goes to live with his elderly and hostile cousin in a small Pennsylvania town where he tries to redeem his blood-craving urges.

name: Born Yesterday
summary_text: A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, with unexpected results.

name: Kajillionaire
summary_text: A woman's life is turned upside down when her criminal parents invite an outsider to join them on a major heist they're planning.

name: Sorry, Wrong Number
summary_text: While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.

name: The Decameron
summary_text: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

name: The Good Thief
summary_text: An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.

name: Metropolitan
summary_text: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely passing through the gala debutante season, when an unusual outsider joins them and stirs them up.

name: All or Nothing
summary_text: In a poor working class London home Penny's love for her partner, taxi-driver Phil, has run dry, but when an unexpected tragedy occurs, they and their local community are brought together, and they rediscover their love.

name: L'aile ou la cuisse
summary_text: Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and the publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast-food entrepreneur Tricatel to save the French art of cooking. After ...                See full summary »

name: Bell Book and Candle
summary_text: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.

name: Snow White: A Tale of Terror
summary_text: In this dark take on the fairy tale, the growing hatred of a noblewoman, secretly a practitioner of the dark arts, for her stepdaughter, and the witch's horrifying attempts to kill her.

name: The Perfect Guy
summary_text: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a professional woman gets involved with a man who seems almost too good to be true.

name: Errementari
summary_text: A quiet village is thrown into turmoil upon disturbing a reclusive and feared blacksmith rumored to be in league with the devil.

name: Burying the Ex
summary_text: A guy's regrets over moving in with his girlfriend are compounded when she dies and comes back as a zombie.

name: Rules Don't Apply
summary_text: The unconventional love story of an aspiring actress, her ambitious driver, and their eccentric boss, the legendary billionaire Howard Hughes.

name: This Beautiful Fantastic
summary_text: A young woman who dreams of becoming a children's book author makes an unlikely friendship with a cantankerous, rich old widower.

name: Whatever It Takes
summary_text: A modern-day remake of the Cyrano DeBergerac tale.

name: Class of 1984
summary_text: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

name: Joe Somebody
summary_text: When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.

name: Amazon Women on the Moon
summary_text: A spoof 1950s science fiction movie, interspersed with various comedy sketches concerning late night television.

name: Time of the Wolf
summary_text: When Anna and her family arrive at their holiday home, they find it occupied by strangers. This confrontation is just the beginning of a painful learning process.

name: Altered
summary_text: Fifteen years ago, a group of men's lives were forever changed by a strange occurrence. Now, the same group of men will spend a night together ... in terror.

name: When the Wind Blows
summary_text: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

name: A War
summary_text: The story of a Danish commander, who is accused of civil murder in Afghanistan, while trying to save his squad.

name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
summary_text: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

name: The Ewok Adventure
summary_text: Wicket the Ewok and his friends agree to help two shipwrecked human children, Mace and Cindel, on a quest to find their parents.

name: The Connection
summary_text: A French police magistrate spends years trying to take down one of the country's most powerful drug rings.

name: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
summary_text: Two female friends become sexual rivals at maturity.

name: Tom and Huck
summary_text: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

name: Begotten
summary_text: Presented in a surreal, gory and entirely visual manner, Begotten tells of the death of religion, the abuse of nature by Man and a nihilistic outlook on what life ultimately is.

name: Blame It on Rio
summary_text: Best friends and their daughters vacation in Rio de Janeiro only for one to fall for the other's daughter.

name: The Pride of the Yankees
summary_text: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

name: Ratchet & Clank
summary_text: When the galaxy comes under the threat of a nefarious space captain, a mechanic and his newfound robot ally join an elite squad of combatants to save the universe.

name: The Enemy Below
summary_text: During World War II, an American destroyer discovers a German U-boat, thus ensuing in a deadly duel between the two ships. The American Captain must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.

name: Dedemin Insanlari
summary_text: Grandpapa and his family were torn from their land, forced to migrate from Crete during the population exchange when he was just seven years old. Grands greatest desire is to see the land ...                See full summary »

name: Dudley Do-Right
summary_text: Inept Canadian mountie Dudley Do-Right chases after villian Snidely Whiplash and woos girlfriend Nell Fenwick.

name: Criminal
summary_text: Two con artists try to swindle a currency collector by selling him a counterfeit copy of an extremely rare currency bill.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
summary_text: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

name: Shotgun Stories
summary_text: Set in Arkansas, this poetic and powerful film directed by Jeff Nichols (Mud, Take Shelter) tracks a blood feud that erupts when two sets of half-brothers come to blows at their father's funeral.

name: And Then We Danced
summary_text: A passionate coming-of-age tale set amidst the conservative confines of modern Tbilisi, the film follows Merab, a competitive dancer who is thrown off balance by the arrival of Irakli, a fellow male dancer with a rebellious streak.

name: Teen Beach Movie
summary_text: Two surfing lovers, whose doomed relationship is nearing to a close, find themselves swept into a dimension-traversing wave that sends them into a beach movie musical in the 60's.

name: Ishqiya
summary_text: While on the run from goons, a man and his nephew fall for a kidnapper's seductive widow.

name: Kuffs
summary_text: George Kuffs, 21, leaves a pregnant girlfriend. He visits his brother Brad to bum money off him. Brad's shot and George IDs the killer at SFPD but to no avail. He inherits Brad's patrol district. He keeps it to get the killer.

name: Ishq
summary_text: Harbans Rai and Ranjit Rai are two wealthy businessmen who absolutely *loathe* poverty and poor people . As fate would have it , Harbans Rai's daughter Madhu falls for a poor mechanic Raja ...                See full summary »

name: Astérix le Gaulois
summary_text: Gaul invaded! Asterix must save the Druid Getafix from the Romans.

name: The Truth About Charlie
summary_text: A woman returns from holiday to find her husband has been murdered, and several groups of people are pressuring her to unravel the mystery of his true identity and activities during his final days.

name: Triage
summary_text: The wife of a photojournalist sets out to discover why he came home from a recent assignment without his colleague.

name: Enduring Love
summary_text: Two strangers become connected by a tragedy, yet one dangerously feels that the connection goes much deeper than the other is willing to admit.

name: Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi
summary_text: Story of Rani Lakshmibai, one of the leading figures of the Indian Rebellion of 1857 and her resistance to the British Rule.

name: The Trouble with Terkel
summary_text: Terkel is an average teenager whose life takes a turn for the worse when a girl who had a crush on him kills herself and an unknown maniac starts stalking him.

name: Spinning Man
summary_text: A happily married professor, known for having many affairs with students, becomes the prime suspect when a young woman has gone missing.

name: Woman on Top
summary_text: Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco when her husband, frustrated by her motion sickness, cheats on her.

name: Jude
summary_text: In late 1800s England, Jude plans to go to the city and attend university but marries early and becomes a stonemason. When his wife leaves, he moves to the city, where he befriends his liberal cousin Sue.

name: Köyden Indim Sehire
summary_text: The sequel of The Stupid Millionaire (1974), the fun continues this time in Ankara, after the 4 brothers find the heritage from their father which is a box-ful of gold.

name: Mary Kom
summary_text: A chronicle of the life of Indian boxer Mary Kom, who went through several hardships before audaciously accomplishing her ultimate dream.

name: Stage Beauty
summary_text: A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desdemona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?

name: Beta Test
summary_text: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a new video game are being mirrored in the real world, and must join forces with the game's protagonist, Orson Creed, to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

name: Wilson
summary_text: A lonely, neurotic, and hilariously honest middle-aged man reunites with his estranged wife, and meets his teenage daughter for the first time.

name: Bullet in the Head
summary_text: When three close friends escape from Hong Kong to war-time Saigon to start a criminal's life, they all go through a harrowing experience which totally shatters their lives and their friendship forever.

name: La Cage aux Folles
summary_text: The manager of a Saint-Tropez nightclub featuring drag entertainment, and his star attraction, are a gay couple. Madness ensues when his straight son brings home a fiancée and her ultra-conservative parents to meet them.

name: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
summary_text: Janey is new in town and soon meets Lynne, who shares her passion for dancing in general and "Dance TV" in particular.

name: Kumbalangi Nights
summary_text: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

name: The Barefoot Contessa
summary_text: This is the life of a Hollywood movie star named Maria, as told by writer/director Harry et al, from being discovered in Madrid, Spain, until her funeral in Italy.

name: Futureworld
summary_text: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

name: Sweet Bean
summary_text: Burdened with a heavy and ever-increasing debt, a dorayaki baker hires a kind ageing woman, after tasting her delicious surprise. Little by little, she unravels her beautiful inner world. Could she be holding the secret to his success?

name: Tokyo!
summary_text: A cinematic triptych of three Tokyo-set stories.

name: Juan of the Dead
summary_text: A group of slackers face an army of zombies. The Cuban government and media claim the living dead are dissidents revolting against the government.

name: Brain Damage
summary_text: One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.

name: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
summary_text: An alien touring the galaxy breaks away from her group and meets two young inhabitants of the most dangerous place in the universe: the London suburb of Croydon.
